Mdat.name: name
Mdat.description: The human-readable name of the ADM.

Mdat.name: organization
Mdat.description: The name of the issuing organization of the ADM.

Edd.name: bp_node_id
Edd.description: The node administration endpoint

Edd.name: bp_node_version
Edd.description: The latest version of the BP supported by this node

Edd.name: available_storage
Edd.description: Bytes available for bundle storage

Edd.name: last_reset_time
Edd.description: The last time that BP counters were reset, either due to execution of a reset control or a restart of the node itself

Edd.name: num_registrations
Edd.description: number of registrations

Edd.name: num_pend_fwd
Edd.description: number of bundles pending forwarding

Edd.name: num_pend_dis
Edd.description: number of bundles awaiting dispatch

Edd.name: num_in_cust
Edd.description: number of bundles

Edd.name: num_pend_reassembly
Edd.description: number of bundles pending reassembly

Edd.name: bundles_by_priority
Edd.description: number of bundles for the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where Bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count

Edd.name: bytes_by_priority
Edd.description: number of bytes of the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count.

Edd.name: src_bundles_by_priority
Edd.description: number of bundles sourced by this node of the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles sourced by this node and matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count.

Edd.name: src_bytes_by_priority
Edd.description: number of bytes sourced by this node of the given priority. Priority is given as a priority mask where bulk=0x1, normal=0x2, express=0x4. Any bundles sourced by this node and matching any of the masked priorities will be included in the returned count

Edd.name: num_fragmented_bundles
Edd.description: number of fragmented bundles

Edd.name: num_fragments_produced
Edd.description: number of bundles with fragmentary payloads produced by this node

Edd.name: num_failed_by_reason
Edd.description: number of bundles failed for any of the given reasons. (noInfo=0x1, Expired=0x2, UniFwd=0x4, Cancelled=0x8, NoStorage=0x10, BadEID=0x20, NoRoute=0x40, NoContact=0x80, BadBlock=0x100)

Edd.name: num_bundles_deleted
Edd.description: number of bundles deleted by this node

Edd.name: failed_custody_bundles
Edd.description: number of bundle fails at this node

Edd.name: failed_custody_bytes
Edd.description: number bytes of fails at this node

Edd.name: failed_forward_bundles
Edd.description: number bundles not forwarded by this node

Edd.name: failed_forward_bytes
Edd.description: number of bytes not forwaded by this node

Edd.name: abandoned_bundles
Edd.description: number of bundles abandoned by this node

Edd.name: abandoned_bytes
Edd.description: number of bytes abandoned by this node

Edd.name: discarded_bundles
Edd.description: number of bundles discarded by this node

Edd.name: discarded_bytes
Edd.description: number of bytes discarded by this node

Edd.name: endpoint_names
Edd.description: CSV list of endpoint names for this node

Edd.name: endpoint_active
Edd.description: is the given endpoint active? (0=no)

Edd.name: endpoint_singleton
Edd.description: is the given endpoint singleton? (0=no)

Edd.name: endpoint_policy
Edd.description: Does the endpoint abandon on fail (0=no)

Rptt.name: full_report
Rptt.description: This is all known meta-data, EDD, and VAR values known by the agent.

Rptt.name: endpoint_report
Rptt.description: This is all known endpoint information

Ctrl.name: reset_all_counts
Ctrl.description: This control causes the Agent to reset all counts associated with bundle or byte statistics and to set the last reset time of the BP primitive data to the time when the control was run
